name: Tesoro Tar Pits
blurb: A collection of thick toxic tar pits
places: Delian Tomb: Underneath the pits, if one can get there, is an ancient tomb. Rumor has it that the Cylinder of Spite is buried here, or was it the Winchester Book?
people: Tentacles of the Pit: The monster that lurks beneath. It has the body of a cow, tentacles of a squid, and a gapping maw unlike any beast. It loves this sewage
misc: Rumor has it there is treasure beneath the pits, or at least there used to be
